Subject: Everyone Please Read
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

Hey everyone. I just wrote this fan fic that Zardus will put on the site
after I send it to him tomorrow. But I wanted to share it with everyone
now, since its the only fan fic that I ever finished.
So please read this fic. It isn't too long. And tell me what you think.
Thanks!


TITLE: The Chosen One (or The Touch)
Author: RoboRick007
Style: Action, Adventure
Started: January 10, 2001
NOTE: This is a quick fic that stars Hot Rod as the hero. (What did ya
expect?)

`````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````

      Two days, six hours, three minutes, and 28 seconds. Thats how long
the battle had been waging. The Maximal base, the Cybertronian Fire, had
been blasted untill it was a scortched hollow scrap of metal. Many of
the Maximals greatest fighters had fallen. Zardus made his big push and
the Maximals wern't ready.

      Hot Rod ran through the woods, getting as far away from the base
as he could.(I know the CF is in open plane, but its my story.) He
passed lifeless body after lifeless body. He looked down at hsi fallen
friends. Prowl, Kluster, Iron Raptor, even Angel Prime had been slayed.
The Maximal Matrix layed beside his body, powerless.

      Several shots wizzed by his head, bringing him from his thoughts.
He kept running, looking over his shoulder. He saw Najah come out from
some brush. He spun around, shooting his last missile at the snake bot.
He smiled as Najah joined the scrap heap.

      "Tastes like chicken," he says to himself, as he keeps running.

      Hot Rod hadn't seen Feline, scince the battle began. He hoped she
was ok. Even though she was Alliance, he lover her.

      After two hours of running in circles he found the terminated body
of Liono Prime. Even this bot who had left, and had been rejected by the
Maximals had come to help. He noticed an object all to familiar in the
hands of Liono. It was the Autobot Matrix of Leadership.

      He was startled by the voices of Unitron, and Firestarter coming
his way. He quickly grabbed the Matrix. The power surged through his
body. His cirquits were alive with the power of the ages. His weapons
returned to full power, and all damage was erased. Rodimus Prime was
back!

      Unitron and Firestarter emerged from the trees, only to see a lone
Transformer rocketing towards them. Rodimus performed a double cloths
line, decapitating both bots. Just then Demoliton flyes over in plane
mode. Rodimus sends a missile up, destroying the bot.

      "That'll keep them out of commision for a wile. Now for Zardus.
Vehical mode!"

      Rodimus Prime transformed to his truck mode.(I'm not going to call
it a Winabego.)

      A rumble was heard at the Cybertronian Fire. Zardus turned only to
see several Alliance bots fly through the air, as a Cybertronian truck
emerged from the woods.

      "What the hell?!" Zardus yells in shock.

      "Rodimus Prime, MAXIMIZE!" Rodimus says, giving his activation
code.

      He transformes to bot mode, and stands in front of Zardus. He
points streight at him.

      "This is the end of the road, Zardus!"

      He then runs at Zardus, giving a series of kicks and punches.
Zardus drops to the ground unable to contend with the ex-Autobot. He
then picks up the Alliance commander, and sends him soaring off into the
horizen.

      Rodimus then holds the Matrix out infront of him, and opens it.

      "Now light our darkest hour!"

      The power of the Matrix is released, and the Cybertronian Fire and
the Maximals are revived to life, and repaired.

      With the Autobot Matrix, Rodimus Prime continued to lead the
Maximals to a new age of victory, as the Neo Beast Wars waged on,
without the Alliance.(Ok so that last part is unlikely.)
